Class Connect4

java.lang.Object
core.Connect4
public class Connect4
extends java.lang.Object
Connect4 The class responsible for the main game logic of Connect4.

    • checkDiagonalWin

      public boolean checkDiagonalWin​(Board b)
      Determines a player has won in the diagonal fashion.
      Parameters:
      b - The board of the game must be provided for evaluation.
      Returns:
      true if a win condition exists false otherwise.

    • checkWin

      public int checkWin()
      Determines if a win condition has been met.
      Returns:
      The type of win. -1 No Win 0 Horizontal 1 Vertical 2 Diagonal
